author: Maurits Hopma
comment: The quiet hours won't work for me. I'm using a Nexus 5 with lollipop (although it didn't work on 4.4.4 either) and a Moto 360 (latest version). I use the grandfather clock only on the watch. If you plan on fixing it feel free to ask for more info! No biggie if you won't. Thank you!
title: Like it a lot but...

author: Stephen Pustai
comment: The device only works daily.  Meaning every day it will not start back up unless i uinstall it and reinstall it.  It does not take long but wish i didnt have to do this.  App does everything i want it to,  except for that.  Fix this and will give 5 stars.
title: Great and not!

author: Mathieu Boyer
comment: I've come to like this app, the little buzz every hour is great for keeping up the time. The settings don't work properly for me, though. Thee watch buzzes every hour regardless of the quiet hours and regardless of if I put it off.

reply.author: r2DoesInc
reply.content: The watch doesnt have much to spare. Long running processes should be ran on the phone.

title: Nice touch

author: Anthony Coyle
comment: Works very well. I always had my regular Casio watch beep on the hour and missed this very simple feature when I upgraded to a smartwatch. I wish Android Wear watches had a small speaker, but what can you do? This is the next best thing to recreate that simple beep and the vibration pattern is  customizable.
title: Works as Advertised

author: John Harris
comment: I like this app a lot, and anyone with Android Wear should definitely get it.  It does have one drawback, however.  Grandfather clock mode.  Specifically, the speed of the "chimes" (actually, vibrations).  They're so fast, that it's difficult to count them.  Indeed, sometimes, it feels like one long vibration instead of several distinct ones.  Still, that shouldn't deter one from installing this app.
title: Great app, with one drawback...

author: Chantale Haineault
comment: I'd like option for different patterns (other then #of hours) to differentiate from other notifications. (I have moto360 so no sound so this is great)

author: Anthony Phillips
comment: Please add more chime intervals. Also, the time interval between chimes in Grandfather-clock mode is too small. The chimes occur so rapidly that it is difficult to accurately count them if you're not expecting the chime to occur. Please allow for user customization of the chime's duration and the time interval between chimes when using Grandfather-clock mode.

author: Jared Cooperband
comment: Can you add an option to not vibrate if its charging? Annoying when its on cradle

author: Mike Cutmore
comment: Useful feature that seems to work well. Quiet hours also seemed to work but confusion upon setting that as it really should have '24 hour clock notation' (I didn't know 09:45pm existed but 21:00 would have prevented all setting confusion since I couldn't seem to set 12:00pm at all without it reverting to 12:00am instead). Nexus 5, Moto 360.
title: Great feature

author: Beatrice Gatta
comment: For example a charging mode where you can choose to keep it silent when charging, both for the phone and for the watch. It would be nice to be able to change the length of the vibration in grandfather's clock mode too, right now they're so short I can't count them right. Make them long enough to be recognizable, like a bell ring is, or let anyone choose their length. Also, let us choose a chime for the half-hour too, please.
title: It needs some more functions

author: Cody Diehl
comment: I remade the common grandfather clock jingle I have always heard. High to low,  Do do do doooo.... Then in the reverse key low to high - Do do do doooo. Lol hard to convey in text but hopefully you get it.
title: Cool!

author: Zachariah DeGraaf
comment: I love the app but it took me a little while to figure out how to set the quite hours properly. Otherwise great app for keeping track of the hours going by.
title: Great app but can be a little confusing

author: Gaurav Kamath
comment: Was working fine until recently. Did something break? I'm on a One plus One and I think it stopped working since the cortana update

author: Benjamin Kvalvåg
comment: I have the first Pebble model, and this app does not work. If someone can help me find a solution, I'll change my rating to 5 stars.
title: Doesn't work.

author: Tess R
comment: I know it's called hourly chime but I'd really like if it had options for every half hour or every quarter hour as well. Can't seem to find any apps that do this.
title: Good

author: Ryan Harris
comment: I enjoy being notified on the hour just like I used to be. However all I get is a vibration, not a beep or grandfather chime. I have an Asus Zenwatch 2
title: Glad I got it but...

author: Jamie Spruce
comment: Gear app that would be made much better with the option of half hour vibrate, with vibrate twice/single option for either hour/half.
title: Needs the option of half hour vibrate.

author: Sherry Howell
comment: Missed the little chirp on my old digital.  I like the little vibration even better.  Thanks.
title: Getting better all the time

author: Alan Anderson
comment: It will only work for a hour or two before it stops working.
title: Nice when working

author: Sokre Haus
comment: Sorry,  seams nice but not working.... would love to see it work..
title: Not working on Sony SW3

author: Ceasar Gomez
comment: Great app. One suggestion.  Would you please have an option to trigger the screen to light up when it vibrates on the hour.

author: Jan Morrida
comment: Does not work, Have made all adjustments, still don't work?

author: All Smiles
comment: It doesn't work at all on my note 5.
title: Doesn't work

author: 0til Lee
comment: I had casio watches for a long time. And i set all of them to bip hourly. Now i can do that with my smartwatch too and that i like.
title: Love it

author: Samuel Stow
comment: seems great I know it's not it's name but would it be possible to make this go off at more regular intervals like every quarter of an hour?

author: Ian Parsonage
comment: Fantastic just what I wanted. The custom setting is great being able to set a custom vibration that couldn't possibly be anything else.
I know it's free but it doesn't work on huawei watch
title: Doesn't work

author: SWANSON SWANSON
comment: No longer working on Moto 360 Sport after Android Nougat update.

author: Pippihontus
comment: Doesn't work on Pebble Time

author: Danny Sola
comment: Didn't work on watch

author: Michael Triplett
comment: Doesn't work
title: Bad

author: Alfonso Gamboa
comment: Please add options for every 15 and 30 minute intervals!
title: great! needs more options.

author: Cristi Moga
comment: Not working on moto 360 v2.

author: SRenee Anderson
comment: Doesn't work :(

author: Benjamin Wallace
comment: Should be built in to the OS. Great idea, thank you for sharing!
title: Thank you

author: Simon Faulkner
comment: Works on and off throughout the day
title: Works randomly

author: Philip Gozun
comment: Helps keep track of work when sales are tacked every hour
title: Very useful

author: Derek Phillips
comment: But seriously this app is freakin' sweet.
title: Buzz buzzz buzzzzzz!

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: It doesn't chime hourly.

author: Rajan Kumar
comment: Not working.
